amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Emerson amendment, which would establish a dispute resolution mechanism for resolving conflicts resulting from actions taken by a state, an interstate waste pollution control agency or the Administrator of EPA relating to the issuance of a license for a hydroelectric project.

action.text: Substitute (A022) offered by Mr. Laughlin to the Emerson amendment (A021).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Laughlin amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 309 - 100 (Roll no. 326).
